Recommendations: 1. Documents should be properly classified, systematically arranged, well packaged and labeled for ease in their evaluation.
2. Increase and sustain the participation of faculty members in research activities along their fields of specialization.

3. Linkages/Consortia with other agencies invite productive exchange of quality outputs aside from the funding derived from them. It would be better then if the program under survey to establish more linkages as well as strengthen existing ones.
4. Conduct of a local seminar along thesis/research writing is highly recommended to come up with netter research outputs.
5. The conduct of research forum in the college level to include those funded personally is highly recommended.
